text: 'inma jaeal almunafiqun 'aymanihim alty aqsmwha strt wwqayt lahum min almwakhdht waledhab, wmneu anfshm, wmneu alnaas ean tariq allah almstqym, 'iinahum bis ma kanuu yemlwn; dhlk li'anahum amanuu fi alzahr, thuma kafaruu fi albatn, fkhtm allah ealaa qulubuhum bsbb kfrhm, fahum la yfhmwn ma fih slahhm
